name: SieÄ‡ Obywatelska Watchdog Polska/Citizens Network Watchdog Poland
goal:
Association promotes and protects human freedoms and rights as well as works for development of democracy, transparency and integrity in public life. Its goals are fulfilled through the following measures:
1. activities enforcing freedom of information;
2. activities for effective, transparent and open way of public finances and public policies management;
3. supporting persons and organizations in overseeing activities of the public authorities;
4. promoting ethical public life and working against corruption.
interests: Budget, Communication, Education, General and Institutional Affairs, Information Society, Justice and Fundamental Rights
euInitiatives:
Transparency of lobbing in the EU.
